title: TutsPlus - Information Graphics
description:
TutsPlus - Information Graphics

Know the difference between a bubble and a locator graph? Got heaps of data you donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t know what to do with? In this course, Cheryl Graham explains all the nuances of data-driven design. Using Adobe Illustrator, Cheryl guides designers through the process of creating useful information graphics. Grab your data and get started! YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll learn:
An introduction to graphs and displaying data.

Creating maps, timelines, and much more!
